title: **Playing the trivia game and the rules:**
intro: Firstly we hope you enjoy the trivia! The game provides a variety of genres to test your music knowledge.
gameplay: Once the countdown for the game ends, make sure to switch over to the Game vc to play!
Listen to a 30 second clip of a song and guess!(You have 30 seconds)
4 multiple choice options to choose from
You are awarded points for guessing right
Based on the difficulty you choose, there will be points deducted
